data.name: Dollar words
data.description:
# The Dollar Word Challenge

A **dollar word** is a word that is worth 100 cents (or points).  Each letter in a word is worth the number of cents (or points) given its position in the alphabet.  For example:

| Letter | Cents / Points|
|:------:|:--------------|
|  a     | 1             |
|  b     | 2             |
|  c     | 3             |
|  ...   |  ...          |
|  z     | 26            |

Please write a function *dollar_word* that takes an input word, and returns **True** if that word is a **dollar word**, or **False** if it is not.  You may assume that the input contains at least one letter, and is composed only of lower case letters from a to z.
